dcterms:creator: Alex Warstadt
Amanpreet Singh
Samuel R. Bowman
dcterms:description: A dataset of over 10k example sentences labeled for acceptability, sampled from linguistics publications discussing numerous linguistic phenomena. The dataset is used to evaluate models' ability to judge grammatical acceptability across a wide domain.
dcterms:title: Corpus of Linguistic Acceptability (CoLA)

dcterms:creator: Alex Wang
Amanpreet Singh
Julian Michael
Felix Hill
Omer Levy
Samuel Bowman
dcterms:description: A multi-task benchmark and analysis platform for natural language understanding, consisting of a set of nine sentence-level classification tasks.
dcterms:title: GLUE benchmark
